price: (112) [Allāh] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years?"
arabic: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla kam labith'tum fī al-arḍi ʿadada sinīna
